metadata.dc:author: Laparra, E
Jiménez, A
Rull, S
Ricart, C
Pastor, A
Tornero, C
metadata.dc:description: We present the clinical outcome and imaging micro and macroscopic of a patient who died of e liver acute failure. Hodgkin disease with massive infiltration was found at necropsy. We offer a review of the liver complaint in this particular disease.
metadata.dc:title: Insuficiencia hepática aguda y enfermedad de Hodgkin.
[Acute hepatic failure and Hodgkin's disease].
